text: The 1989–90 Villanova Wildcats men's basketball team represented Villanova University in the 1989–90 season. The head coach was Rollie Massimino. The team played its home games at The Pavilion in Villanova, Pennsylvania, and was a member of the Big East Conference. == Roster == ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular Season |- !colspan=9 style=| Big East Tournament |- !colspan=9 style=| NCAA Tournament ==Rankings== == References == Category:Villanova Wildcats men's basketball seasons Villanova Villanova Villanova Villanova
